text: Macomb County is a county located in the eastern portion of the U.S. state of Michigan and is part of northern Metro Detroit. As of the 2020 census, the population was 881,217. It is the third-most populous county in the state. The county seat is Mt. Clemens. ==References== Category:1810s establishments in Michigan Territory Category:1818 establishments in the United States Category:Michigan counties
title: Macomb County, Michigan
